annotation.summary: This section defines how a character’s or creature’s health is measured and tracked in the game, representing their ability to sustain damage before falling unconscious or dying.

Damage reduces current HP; healing restores it up to the maximum.
At 0 HP, a creature may fall unconscious or begin dying, depending on system rules.
Maximum HP is determined by class, level, and Constitution or equivalent attributes.
